subject: Re: [junit] J2EE source directory structure
msgSnippet: Try AntHill at http://www.urbancode.com/projects/anthill/default.xml Just came across that a few days ago as well, haven t tried it out yet. Cheers, Herry ...
messageBody:
Try AntHill at
http://www.urbancode.com/projects/anthill/default.xml

Just came across that a few days ago as well, haven't
tried it out yet.

Cheers,
Herry
